entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023
